headline: Corpay Cross-Border Launches Multi-Currency Accounts
summary: TORONTO, February 12, 2025--Corpay, Inc. (NYSE: CPAY), a global leader in corporate payments, is thrilled to announce that Corpay’s Cross-Border business has introduced Multi-Currency Accounts, enabling ever-growing businesses to expand their global footprints while enjoying hassle-free and seamless foreign currency management, in one single point of access.
